# actionKeys

**Instance Property**

The list of keys for which the node has attached actions.

## Declaration

```swift
var actionKeys: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to list actions you scheduled using the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNActionable/runAction(_:forKey:)] or [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNActionable/runAction(_:forKey:completionHandler:)] method.

## Inspecting a Node’s Running Actions

- **action(forKey:)**: Returns an action associated with a specific key.
- **hasActions**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the node is currently executing any actions.
